Text: Viruses detected in this torrent in a couple of the ppt files

There are no viruses there, those are false positives you are getting. 

You can check them, as I did with with Mcafee and virus total
http://www.virustotal.com/
They were cleared by both. I have the full version of Mcafee on my PC.
Engineering, meaning to build. Mecha, meaning giant robot. I CAN BUILD MY OWN MECHA? I shall rule the world with an iron, no STEEL, fist.
